name: (Kind Of) A 2 Player Game.
description:
So this is for Brackeys Game Jam 2022. This is my first ever game so yeah sorry it's not finished. It was just like learning how to swim by jumping in the deep end and kicking for dear life.

So controls for Night (Black) are wasd and e to open the door and for day (white) are arrow keys and left shift to open door.

everything but menu music was taken away, listen to menu music + bonus tracks that didn't make it here: https://www.bandlab.com/user7124978705778274/albums/f15dcebf-d022-ed11-95d7-0022...

Anyway, vote 1 SO2PG!
